verses.verse: These are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> which you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3117>it,<s%> all the days that you <S%H2416>live<s%> on the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

You shall <S%H6>surely<s%> <S%H6>destroy<s%> all the <S%H4725>places<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> you shall <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> on the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and on the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree:<s%>

and you shall <S%H7665>break<s%> down their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H7665>dash<s%> in pieces their <S%H4676>pillars,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H842>Asherim<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> and you shall cut <S%H1438>down<s%> the engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods;<s%> and you shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> out of that <S%H4725>place.<s%>
You shall not do <S%H6213>so<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

But to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> out of all your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7933>there,<s%> even to his habitation you shall <S%H1875>seek,<s%> and there you shall <S%H935>come;<s%>

and there you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> and the wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and your freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> and the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flock:<s%>

and there you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in all that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1004>to,<s%> you and your households, in which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has blessed <S%H1288>you.<s%>
You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> after all the things that we <S%H6213>do<s%> here this <S%H3117>day,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> whatever is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>
for you <S%H935>haven't<s%> yet come to the <S%H4496>rest<s%> and to the <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you.<s%>

But when you go <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> causes you to <S%H5157>inherit,<s%> and he gives you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H3427>you,<s%> so that you dwell in <S%H983>safety;<s%>

then it shall happen that to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H935>there,<s%> there you shall bring all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H5930>you:<s%> your burnt offerings, and your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> and the wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and all your <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%> which you <S%H5087>vow<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

You shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> and your sons, and your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and your male <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and your female <S%H519>servants,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> who is within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has no <S%H2506>portion<s%> nor inheritance with <S%H5159>you.<s%>
Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself that you <S%H5927>don't<s%> offer your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> in every <S%H4725>place<s%> that you <S%H7200>see;<s%>

but in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> there you shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and there you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> all that I command <S%H6680>you.<s%>

<S%H2076>Notwithstanding,<s%> you may kill and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> within all your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H185>after<s%> all the <S%H185>desire<s%> of your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which he has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2931>you:<s%> the unclean and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H354>it,<s%> as of the gazelle, and as of the hart.
Only you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood;<s%> you shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> it out on the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

You <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H1715>grain,<s%> or of your new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> or of your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> or the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> or of your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> nor any of your <S%H5088>vows<s%> which you <S%H5087>vow,<s%> nor your freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> nor the wave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand;<s%>

but you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> and your son, and your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and your male <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and your female <S%H519>servant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> who is within your <S%H8179>gates:<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in all that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your hand <S%H3027>to.<s%>
Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself that you <S%H5800>don't<s%> forsake the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> as long as you <S%H3117>live<s%> in your <S%H127>land.<s%>

When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> your <S%H1366>border,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> and you shall say, "I want to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat,<s%>" because your <S%H5315>soul<s%> desires to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat;<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat,<s%> <S%H185>after<s%> all the <S%H185>desire<s%> of your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

If the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H7368>there,<s%> is too far from <S%H2076>you,<s%> then you shall kill of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6680>you,<s%> as I have commanded <S%H398>you;<s%> and you may eat within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H185>after<s%> all the desire of your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Even as the <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> and as the <S%H354>hart<s%> is <S%H398>eaten,<s%> so you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H2931>it:<s%> the unclean and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of it <S%H3162>alike.<s%>

Only be <S%H2388>sure<s%> that you <S%H398>don't<s%> eat the <S%H1818>blood:<s%> for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is the <S%H5315>life;<s%> and you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> with the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8210>it;<s%> you shall pour it out on the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3190>it;<s%> that it may go well with <S%H1121>you,<s%> and with your children <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> when you shall do that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Only your holy <S%H6944>things<s%> which you <S%H5088>have,<s%> and your vows, you shall <S%H5375>take,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%>

and you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be poured <S%H8210>out<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

<S%H8104>Observe<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H3190>you,<s%> that it may go well with <S%H1121>you,<s%> and with your children <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5704>you<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> when you <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>you,<s%> where you go in to <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> <S%H3423>them,<s%> and you dispossess <S%H3427>them,<s%> and dwell in their <S%H776>land;<s%>

take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself that you not be <S%H5367>ensnared<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H310>them,<s%> after that they are <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1875>you;<s%> and that you not inquire after their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "How do these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods?<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1571>likewise.<s%>"

You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> so to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> for every <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H8130>hates,<s%> have they <S%H6213>done<s%> to their <S%H430>gods;<s%> for even their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> do they <S%H8313>burn<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> to their <S%H430>gods.<s%>
Whatever <S%H1697>thing<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H8104>you,<s%> that you shall observe to <S%H6213>do:<s%> you shall not <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H1639>thereto,<s%> nor diminish from it.
